扜字的基本解释

扜
yū
指挥。
持。
引；拉：“有人方扜弓射黄蛇，名曰蜮人。”

扜
wū
〔扜零〕中国古代西域小宛国地名。

扜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yū］
［《廣韻》億俱切，平虞，影。］
(1)挽，张。
(2)引，导。
[②]［wū］
见“扜2零”、“扜2罙”。

扜字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　扜； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页417第24
【唐韻】憶俱切【集韻】邕俱切，?音紆。【說文】指麾也。　又持也。　又【廣韻】況于切【集韻】匈于切，?音吁。義同。

扜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
扜字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Shun
yū
command.
hold.
Quote; pull: "Someone shoots a yellow snake with a bow and is called a mythical creature."
Shun
wū
〔扜零〕The place name of Xiaowan Country in the Western Regions in ancient China.
Shun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yū］
["Guang Yun" Yi Ju cut, Ping Yu, shadow. ]
(1) Wan, Zhang.
(2) Lead, guide.
[②]［wū］
See "扜2零", "扜2罙".
Shun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　扜; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 417-24
[Tang Yun] Recalling Juqie [Jiyun] Yong Juqie,? Yin 纡. [Said the text] refers to the 麾 also.　Hold it again.　[Guangyun] Kuang Yuqie [Jiyun] Hungry Yuqie,? Yin Yu. The same meaning.
